SELECT ad.document_no documentNo, ad.id id, ad.document_title documentTitle, ad.approval_document_cd approvalDocumentCd, ad.temp_save tempSave, ad.reg_dtime regDtime, ad.mod_dtime modDtime, ad.reg_id regId, ad.mod_id modId FROM approval_document ad
ad.document_no IN ( SELECT ar.document_no FROM approval_ref ar WHERE ar.ref_id = #{loginId})

SELECT document_no documentNo, id, document_title documentTitle, document_content documentContent, approval_status_cd approvalStatusCd, temp_save tempSave, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM approval_document
id = #{loginId} documentNo = #{documentNo}
SELECT CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), 2), LPAD(MONTH(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), 2, '0'), #{approvalDocumentCd}, RIGHT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(4), 4)) AS documentNo;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_document( document_no, id, document_title, document_content, approval_document_cd, temp_save, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id )VALUES( #{documentNo}, #{id}, #{documentTitle}, #{documentContent}, #{approvalDocumentCd}, #{tempSave}, NOW(), NOW(), #{regId}, #{modId} )

INSERT INTO approval_ref( ref_no refNo, ref_id refId, document_no documentNo, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId )VALUES( #{refNo}, #{refId}, #{documentNo}, NOW(), NOW(), #{loginId}, #{loginId} )
